article: That night, Joe came back home very late, pulling his heavy legs, obviously tired He then sat down by the window, _ his head Hearing her husband back, Kay _ out of the kitchen, but to her _ , Joe sat still, without _ Usually, when he came back, he would greet her with a kiss or a hug Immediately Kay _ something unusual She went over to Joe and asked, Tell me, my dear, any _ news? Well, I have to say that things are not in our _ It seems that I have no _ to defeat my opponent He s much more _ , for he s been holding the position for nearly four years, and people think he s done a _ job Many signs show that he s in the _ Oh, really? But I still believe you have our own _ You re in your forties at the best age for a man You re new, so people have reasons to _ you to do better So let s go to the voters and tell hem, Give Joe Hart a chance, and he ll show you who s your better _ Their next three weeks were spent _ different neighborhoods, going to all kinds of parties, and making speeches at universities and gatherings Even Judy and Julie, their small children, went from door to door, _ their Please vote for our daddy, Joe Hart! The night before the _ vote, the whole Hart family were too _ to fall asleep The moment before the final result was declared, their _ were brought to their mouths, but at last they all _ and burst into tears Joe Hart became head judge of the state of Texas, USA 26
